name: Final Blockade
description:
game introduction
"Final Blockade" is a doomsday 2.5D barrage shooter Rogue Like game. The whole city has been invaded by zombies.

Game Features

1. The map is randomly generated

2. A variety of energy drinks

3. Abundant types of zombies

4. Merchant promotion system

Use W-A-S-D to manipulate the movement of the protagonist

Shoot with the left mouse button

As a brave man, go out to destroy zombies for the survival of mankind, enrich your abilities and live.
